title: 204 - Is That a Death Stone?
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a full hause of characters, who start off catching up on the amazing weekend they had here in Indianapolis. They get into first thoughts and opinions from the movie taking over the globe, Batman scene by our very own Boston Connor. Next the boys jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things from the internet. Todays FOD includes some good spider talk, a look at new military gear, a mythical death stone and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
